column2: [[2015]])<ref>[http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-32493678]</ref> served as the director of photography for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] and for [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]]. He won an Academy Award for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
